entries.title: Toki Toki city
entries.description: Central hub for all Time Patrollers. Protected by the Supreme Kai of Time and the bird-like deity Toki Toki.

entries.title: Trunks (Xeno)
entries.description: The saiyan from the future that was recruited by the Supreme Kai of Time.

entries.title: The Omnificence Crystal
entries.description: This crystal was formed once Zahha united a blue crystal and a red crystal into one after they were inserted into Shallot and Giblet respectively so they can be powered up.

entries.title: Zaha
entries.description:
Zahha is a mysterious magical swordsman who initially appears as a supportive figure to the protagonist, Shallot. He aids in battles and offers guidance, 
        but as the story unfolds, his true intentions and identity as the Mastermind are revealed.

entries.title: Shallet
entries.description: The fusion of the main character Shallot and Giblet
